name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Jiangxi non-staff personnel had their passports and Hong Kong and Macau passes confiscated, and were prohibited from leaving the country by their leaders. I can't help but complain that for this salary of more than 3,000 yuan, they have lost their freedom

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A physical education teacher at a primary school in Hangzhou sexually harassed several junior high school students, and his leader verbally criticized him.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 26, in Nanjing, a woman took an online taxi and asked to drive the car into the community after arriving at the destination. The driver was unwilling and started an argument. The woman called her husband and said that she was bullied. Then her husband came with a wrench and hit the online taxi driver on the head in the street. It is reported that the party involved has paid 35,000 yuan as compensation, but some netizens insist that in addition to financial compensation, the offender must be punished by law. On the afternoon of the 27th, the local police responded: The driver has been sent to the hospital, and the case is currently under investigation and evidence collection. Other details are inconvenient to disclose.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 25, in Taiyuan, Shanxi, a child was electrocuted and fainted in the water after a heavy rain. Witnesses said that the child's family was not around at the time and no one dared to rescue him until the water receded before sending him to the hospital.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 26, in front of Taishan People's Hospital in Jiangmen, Guangdong, a drunk woman drove a Tesla and crashed into a guardrail, losing control of her emotions and yelling at passers-by and police, "If I don't lock it, I'm going to kill you all."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: "The good life we have today has only lasted a few years"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The missing child has been found.
Some netizens found through searching that the suspect Yang Ruixue is not only a Beijing NPC representative, but also the director of the General Office of the National People's Congress, the director of the Retired Cadres Bureau of the General Office of the National People's Congress, and the president of the Democratic and Legal Publishing House.
Her husband is the deputy director of CCTV, the party secretary and director of the Central News Record Film Studio.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, it was reported online that Chongqing Bishan District has set up a special working group for "sell off everything". The online document shows that the working group is responsible for the "sell off everything" work in the district. The media learned from the Bishan District Finance Bureau that the "sell off everything" working group has begun to operate. However, it is not just Chongqing, the four words "sell off everything" have long appeared in the work reports or documents of many local governments.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 27, Hangzhou, Zhejiang. An old man claimed to be disabled and kept hitting passengers with an umbrella, demanding that they give up their seats. "You don't have any elderly people in your family, you don't have a father or mother, you don't have grandparents, they are all dead."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 25, Jinzhong, Shanxi. It was reported online that Shuanglin Plasma Donation Center in Heshun County invited students to donate plasma four times or more in two and a half months with a 200 yuan "student subsidy".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 25, a netizen posted that she asked several boys, but they didn't know that the golden hoop was hidden in Sun Wukong's ear, and suspected that they were spies. Many netizens left messages about the "500,000" that might exist around them.
